name: Kylo Ren
subtitle: Bound By The Force
text: Power Action - Move 1 shield from this character to another character. Then, if you moved that shield to a hero, deal 1 damage to a character. [special] - Deal 2 damage to a character. If any of this damage is blocked, reroll this die instead of removing it.

name: Thrawn
subtitle: Grand Admiral
text: After you activate this character, you may look at the top 4 cards of a deck. Power Action - Reveal the top 4 cards of an opponent's deck. You may play an event revealed this way and spot that opponent's cards as if they were yours.

flavor: "I like to know the deeper meanings of the pieces I collect." <cite>Grand Admiral Thrawn</cite>
name: Cultural Records
text:
After a player plays a copy of a card set aside by this support, you may gain 1 resource or remove a die.
[special] - Look at an opponent's hand and set a card from it aside. Gain 1 action.

flavor: "Victory and defeat are often determined by the smallest detail." <cite>Grand Admiral Thrawn</cite>
name: Mastermind
text: [special] - Name a card. Then reveal an opponent's hand and set each copy of the named card from it aside.

name: Rey
subtitle: Bound By The Force
text: Power Action - Reroll a character die or turn a villain character die to a side showing a value of 0. [special] - Give 2 shields to a character. Then, if that character has 3 or more shields, reroll this die instead of removing it.

name: Cheif Chirpa
subtitle: Brught Tree Village Elder
text: After setup, add a set-aside Ewok Warrior ([SoH]95) to your team. [special] - Deal 2 indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent, or 3 indirect damage instead if you spot 4 Ewoks.

name: Ewok Warrior
text: Include only if you have a unique Ewok on your team. After you activate this character, you may deal 1 indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent.

name: Ewok Ambush
text: Ambush. Activate one of your non-elite characters or up to 3 of your Ewok characters.

flavor: "Well, short help is better than no help at all." <cite>Han Solos</cite>
name: Chief Chirpa's Hut
text: [special] - Add a set-aside Ewok Warrior ([SoH]95) to your team. Discard this support from play unless you spend 3 resources.

name: Ewok Bow
text: While this upgrade is on an Ewok, it gains Redeploy.

name: Temporary Truce
text: You can only include Kylo Ren and Rey on your team (you can include villain and hero cards in your deck). You cannot include Gray cards in your deck.
